content:
Maybe you could try using the following server settings:

1. Incoming Server (IMAP recommended):

1.1. IMAP: mail.centurylink.net Port: 993 Security: SSL

1.2. POP: pop.centurylink.net Port: 995 Security: SSL

2. Outgoing Server SMTP: smtp.centurylink.net Port: 587 Security: TLS if available

Reference: https://www.centurylink.com/home/help/internet/email/how-to-set-up-your-email-server-settings-to-go-through-pop-and-smtp.html
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
